parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. 6 months is 15552000

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to use. Valid for multiple call and expires in 2 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shop/store unique identifier for a shop. Required param for

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated to protect API call path

response_fields.name: wtsi_region
response_fields.description: The warehouse region found with the shop

response_fields.name: wtsi_ids
response_fields.description: The warehouse id bound with the shop
